ApiKey.description: Gets or sets a string value that indicates the ApiKey to connecting elastic cloud.

CloudId.description: Gets or sets a string value that indicates the CloudId to connecting elastic cloud.

Cloud.description: Gets or sets cloud connection setting that indicates the connection to elastic cloud.

ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the comma-delimited configuration string used to connect to the Elasticsearch.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the Elasticsearch health check is disabled or not.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: Gets or sets a integer value that indicates the Elasticsearch health check timeout in milliseconds.

UseCloud.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the connection to elastic cloud or not.
